author: PaulHigin
body:
This may have something to do with PSReadline on Linux since remote debugging works correctly in the other direction (Windows -> Linux).
## Steps to reproduce
1.  Set up Windows machine and Linux VM for SSH remoting (see docs).
2.  Create interactive session from Linux -> Windows
    Enter-PSSession -HostName <WindowsHost> -UserName <username>
3.  Set breakpoint in script on windows machine and run in remote session.
   Set-PSBreakpoint test.ps1 -line 12
   test.ps1
4.  After debugger stops type a debugger command at the prompt
   [WindowsHost] PS C: />> list
## Expected behavior

Expect debugger command to work.
## Actual behavior

Command prompt hangs
## Environment data
title: Linux -> Windows remote debugging does not work
